channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cop30 live: ‘We need to think about how to live without fossil fuels’ Brazilian president Lula tells summit
item.description: Brazilian president underlines need to reduce emissions as Turkey set to host next year’s summit One big piece of news out of Belém last night was tha...

item.title: Man arrested in Sydney for alleged harassment of federal MP over neo-Nazi criticism
item.description: AFP allege the 30-year-old sent a ‘menacing message’ to an MP believed to be Allegra Spender after she condemned far-right protests Get our breaking n...

item.title: Failed asylum seekers could be given ‘big increase’ in payments to leave voluntarily, home secretary says – UK politics live
item.description: Shabana Mahmood says scheme could increase the £3,000 cap currently in place and that payments are ‘good value for money’ In an interview with ITV, Ke...

item.title: US and Russian officials have reportedly drafted 28-point plan to end Ukraine war
item.description: Volodymyr Zelenskyy to meet Pentagon envoys amid fears proposed deal would hand Ukrainian territory to Russia Europe live – latest updates US and Russ...

item.title: Justice department has 30 days to release all Epstein files after Trump signs bill – US politics live
item.description: Trump attacks Democrats as he seeks to shape the narrative surrounding his links with the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein The Trump administration p...

item.title: Panel split over disallowed Liverpool goal at Man City
item.description: The Premier League's KMI Panel votes 3-2 both that Liverpool's goal should have stood on-field, but didn't reach the VAR threshold.

item.title: Rapist ex-Met officer David Carrick given another life sentence for further sex offences
item.description: David Carrick is sentenced for sexually abusing a 12-year-old girl and raping a former partner.

item.title: US military officials in Kyiv as Europe warns against reported Russia peace plan
item.description: It comes after reports the US and Russia have prepared a 28-point peace plan, allegedly with major concessions from Ukraine.

item.title: We'll take time to get trans guidance right, says minister
item.description: The new code of practice on access to single-sex services cannot gain legal force until it gets sign-off from ministers.

item.title: Trump signs bill ordering US justice department to release Epstein files
item.description: The bill gives the US Justice Department 30 days to release all the files in a searchable format.
